body:
We're gonna need a little more info than that, again with the caveat that Desktop Radiance hasn't been officially supported in ages.


With that said, what exactly are you doing that produces the error message?


Rob Guglielmetti
National Renewable Energy Laboratory (NREL)
Commercial Buildings Research Group
15013 Denver West Parkway MS:RSF202
Golden, CO 80401
303.275.4319
robert.guglielmetti at nrel.gov






On 3/12/13 11:02 AM, "shailan zareiy" <sh.zareiy at gmail.com<mailto:sh.zareiy at gmail.com>> wrote:








hi every body
I've recently installed my desktop radiance again, but unfortunatly when i want to analyse, this error occurs : system- cannot open octree file " filename.oct" : no such file or directory
Does anyone knows what is the problem?
thanks
Shailan
